caption.p: Effect of increasing concentration of Cs–Se NPs on K + ( A), Na + ( B), proline ( C) and total soluble carbohydrate ( D) content of bitter melon ( Momordica charantia) leaves under salinity stress. The SDs denoted by lower-case letters in the same treatment indicates significant differences at p < 0.05 according to Tukey’s post hoc test.
